I’m trashing the LumiLux and buying the ones and I can gift the second one...both for less that what I paid for this one.

customer_reviews.title: Ready, Aim, Fire
customer_reviews.text: If you ever had problems hitting your mark in the wee hours of the night, you need a LumiLux Toilet Bowl Light. It is not a novelty item but a product you will never live without in the future. The LumiLux installs easily, has all the settings you would need and illuminates your target without bright lights that may disrupt your sleep cycle during those middle-of-the-night journeys to the bathroom. Their customer service is exemplary and that really adds to the value of the LumiLux. About the only thing I would change is having the unit powered by 2 instead of 3 batteries. Otherwise, try one of these lights and you will be convinced.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredInAz

customer_reviews.title: Great Practical Gag Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandpa who suffered from dementia to be a fun way to help him find the bathroom in the middle of the night. That didn't necessarily work out, but my grandma LOVES this. She loves the color changing, said it was easy to set up and works magnificently. The only thing she doesn't like is it makes her feel like she has to clean her toilet every 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Police

customer_reviews.title: Makes middle of the night visits much easier
customer_reviews.text: I can't ever make it through a whole night without having to use the restroom due to how much water I constantly drink. Night light isn't bright enough and doesn't help me where I need to go. Definitely don't want to turn on the main lights and risk blinding myself. Cue in this little toilet light thing. Saw something similar on Shark Tank and knew I wanted one. Can't speak to battery life but so far, this thing has been working perfect. Detects darkness well and catches sligh motion only by the toilet itself. Huge help for half-asleep aim! Plus the colors are pretty fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Who needs this?
customer_reviews.text: Who needs this? The obvious answer is no one. But, but, I like it, I really like it. Who would have thought that having a soft, subtle, luminescent light inside the toilet bowl that sees you coming and shines while you do your night time business was a good idea? Kudos, my dear inventor. You have just created a decadent luxury, totally unnecessary but so appreciated. No more stubbing my toes on the vanity, no more missing the bowl center during my nocturnal bladder emptying. And so reassuring that I made it to the loo and not the kitchen. I need it and I am so glad and proud to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I know, the idea of this thing seems silly, but its really the greatest little gadget. I bought this light to replace another brand with an internal rechargeable battery. When the battery on that unit diet it couldn't be replaced. I like that this light has replaceable batteries. The brightness of the light can be easily adjusted and the colors are great. The range of the motion sensor works all the way out to where the bathroom meets the hallway in my house which means we have light from the moment we step into the bathroom. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: eevelyn

customer_reviews.title: Night light, not toilet light!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product. I bought it for my wife for obvious reasons when using the bathroom at night. Unfortunately I didn’t like it hanging over the edge of the toilet. Kind of grossed me out because it was getting dirty from toilet splash, sorry guys. So we opted to use it as a night light placed just above the toilet on a window ledge and it works great. Just the right amount of light. Instructions are concise. In the two years I’ve owned it I’ve change the batteries twice. We also have a motorhome so I drag it along when we’re traveling, again to use as a night light.
customer_reviews.author: LSofSacto

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my husband gets up in the middle of the night and tries to be considerate and doesn’t turn on the light. Well.... needless to say he misses in the dark. I saw this on amazon and thought I’d buy it more as a gentle reminder. He rolled his eyes and thought I was nuts. Well.... let me tell you he loves it and so do I!!! It gives off enough light to see and works perfect. It isn’t bright so it doesn’t wake anyone up and is a great alternative to the bright bathroom light. My husband now thinks I’m brilliant for buying this. Lol I’m buying one for my guest bathroom also.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Motion Detection Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was really skeptical that this product would detect motion in the dark but it sure does! We replaced our bathroom nightlight in the master bath with this motion sensor LED and now don't have to keep the bathroom door closed at night because of the light. The only change I'd make is a still lower brightness setting but otherwise it's dang near perfect. The toilet light has been in use for just over a month now, no issues with battery or it failing to turn on when someone approaches at any hour of the night. Two-thumbs up, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Fischler

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the idea, 1 star for execution
customer_reviews.text: I loved, loved, loved this product. My husband is visually impaired (extreme low vision) so having this very bright light inside the toilet bowl was invaluable to him at night for aiming purposes. And it worked great for me as well to have a nightlight so I didn't have to turn on the lights at 2am. It worked so well for 6 months...then it up and died. I cleaned it, changed the batteries, it's just dead. I'll definitely buy another one, but it'll be a different brand as this one doesn't seem to be able to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna75

customer_reviews.title: I love this toilet light 😀👍

The sensor works great and it is bright enough to not need to turn any light on. It is also easy to clean. It was easy to set to the color I wanted which is a pretty blue. I had planned to get a very expensive toilet seat with the light built in but it was damaged on delivery so I bought this in the meantime and since it works so well I decided I don’t need that expensive toilet seat with the light after all !

customer_reviews.title: Never be awakend by a bright light in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.text: The Lumilux toilet light is great, I'm very happy with it. I purchased it to replace another Bowl light I have that is beginning to have problems. The quality and workmanship of the lumilux is superior to my old one. I like these because when I need to get up during the night, this toilet light comes on instead of me turning on a bright overhead light. I can easily get back to sleep. Overall its a great device, I can't say much about the battery life because I've only had this light a short time. I'm sure it will do well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No More Stumbling in the Dark
customer_reviews.text: Our family members and the toilet itself love this fun light. But it's more than fun--it adds safety to visiting the toilet in the middle of the night, and it eliminates the necessity of turning the bright bathroom lights on. Just put the batteries in and hook the light over the toilet bowl rim. The room has to be quite dark for the light to activate, and it might take 30 seconds for it to turn itself off (it won't turn off if you're standing there watching in awe as the colors change). Adjustable brightness and color scheme (alternating or static). A nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Almost Two Years and Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my batteries for the first time since I purchased it in August 2017. After awhile, the light becomes reassuring and you'll want a couple to put in different places in your house. I currently have one on the bathroom towel rack and another one in the kitchen. The light is set to red so that it keeps us in a semi-sleep state. Addendum: Bought a third one for yet another bathroom. I don't hook any of them on the toilet as designed for hygiene reasons. The oneis sitting on the counter and has the motion detector pointed toward the toilet and the light pointed toward the mirror. Works perfectly that way.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Best Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! You can have it as bright or dim as you want. It is so much gentler on the eyes for the middle of the night breaks than the white overhead light. The color variety is wonderful. I see a lot of jesting about this product but it is a brilliant idea and greatly improves the quality of life for anyone making nighttime bathroom runs. The best part, though, is the customer service. We had to reach out to Upper Echelon about this product and they responded quickly and fixed our issue promptly. We will definitely be keeping our eyes out for other products from this company because customer service like this does not come around often.

customer_reviews.text: I waited a little bit to post my review because we were given one of these by another company and we liked it a lot but it sucked batteries and then died in about a month. So far the LumiLux Light seems far superior to the other brand's light. We haven't had to change the batteries yet and it has been several weeks and it's still working like a charm. It also has 8 more colors than the other light. Lights up the bathroom quite well at night when you need to see. The LumiLux was well worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Bethumz

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: I've got two of these lights now, with the first being a gift. The light makes the toilet bowl appear to glow, which is cool, and it's surprisingly bright for such a small bulb. My second one did have some problem and stopped working after a couple months. It's nice that they come with a lifetime warranty. Customer service was great. They responded very quickly and they're sending me a new one.

It’s more exciting for them to use it, too. The motion sensor works amazing-I can be at the top of the stairs and it catches my movement. We’ve had it over a month, if not 2 and the battery is still going strong. I highly recommend this light! We’ll be adding more to our collection for each toilet in our house.

What that means is it doesn't slide around the bowel and doesn't fall if when you lower the seat. This is the one to buy!

We stood in the doorway (off to the side) just to watch it shut off and turn back on when we would walk by. I loved it so much I bought 2 more. One for my nephew who is newly potty-trained and another one cause my boyfriend travels and he is disappointed that the hotel toilets don't have this option on the rooms.

customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for dark zombie bathroom walkers like me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hate to turn on light cause you get blinded? get this!!!! works like a charm and love the color options also!!! do not have to put in toilet if you dont want too, can place on wall or toilet paper rack. I like not peeing on floor now cause I can see where I am aiming... As of sept 13 item no longer works. Bringing down my star rating because of longevity. Right now item is just trash.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet light for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old grandson because he goes to the bathroom late and sometimes wakes up to use the bathroom and it's very dark. The motion detector works great and the light is very bright. My grandson loves how it changes colors and he doesn't have to bother turning on and off the bathroom light nor is he scared to go to the bathroom at night anymore! Thank you for the great little useful gadget. I'm sure to recommend this to other grandparents and young mothers in my circle. The only thing that would have made it better would for it to come with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old who is afraid of going to the bathroom at night because of the dark. This thing helps so much and he loves the colors. On another note, I had a few friends over for a BBQ and got a couple comments from people who used the bathroom and thought this was the coolest thing ever. It's extremely responsive. You are barely turning the corner to the bathroom and it lights up. Had it for a few months now and it's still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Toliet Light
customer_reviews.text: The toilet light was cool to start, very sensitive to motion so it turned on frequently at first so we had to adjust position. Colors were nice and bright however once battery died and replaced, it completely stopped working, which was a bummer. I don't mind replacing batteries but at least keep working, I feel like the life of the product should be at least 6 months, minimum. Overall could be a great product if it lasted longer, ours was a bust after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: Great light for nighttime bathroom trips!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for what its purpose is! My eyes don't get burned out anymore by the overhead lights in my bathroom in the middle of the night! The motion sensor on this light works perfectly. It senses me as soon as I step foot in the doorway which is probably 10-15 feet away. The light is bright enough to illuminate the bathroom just the right amount. The light color changes every few seconds, but you can set it up to be a steady color if wanted. It fits on the toilet bowl with no issues and does not impede the seat. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 month but broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. but within the first few months it stopped working. Changed the battery and everything. Ended up throwing it away. I bought it because it showed up on some list of highly recommended products. Started off great but didn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great. Pee Proof? We'll See.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd toilet light all three from different brands. Ultimately none of these are peepee proof and also being a dude, sometimes you get distracted or may miss your target. I used some sealant on the last one and got good life out of it. The first one was my favorite since it faded through all the colors. This one does, too, but it's a fast fade. It fades on and off so it doesn't hit you like a ton of bricks for that 0300 pee trip.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ortwein

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It worked with no issue the first month. And then the lights started to turn off shortly after they are turned on (the lights are supposed to stay on for 2 minutes after turning on). I changed the batteries thinking it run out of batteries but the same thing with new batteries. After 3 months of use, It stopped working; the lights don't turn on. changing batteries didn't help. I really liked the product and hoped it will last longer. what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: kuku

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've had this product for some time now and I love it, but I was having a problem with it and I contacted LumiLux's Customer Service and they responded immediately. They resolved my issue the very next day. LumiLix truly lives up to their word by providing outstanding customer service. Buy this product with confidence, you wont regret it! Where has this been all my life. If you feel like your walking into the sun at night when you flick on the bathroom light, this product is for you. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: dg50484

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I wanted to love this! I saw this on shark tank and had to get it for my kids bathroom. Sadly it doesn’t work as I expected it to. The motion detector really doesn’t Start until you sit on the toilet! Which is pointless if wanting to use this as a night light. Also it has a bulky piece that sticks out quite noticeably on the side of the toilet. I moved it all around but that’s the piece that has the sensor on it so you really need to have it closer to the front of the toilet. Such a cool idea I wish it worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Birkby

customer_reviews.title: Great product support!!  Love my light works great.
customer_reviews.text: Best product support ever!! My light stopped working a year after I bought it and I reached out to the company through the contact us since I could not figure out how to process my warranty for my registered light. Rebecca from support contacted me and promptly replaced my light. She was extremely nice and understanding and apologized for the light malfunction. I received my replacement light within a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: It would be a plus if there could be an outside light that lights up as well as the inside lights because this provides more light in the bathroom. I had one that did that, and it was great.?The light does what it’s supposed to do. Has a good warranty. I’m happy. I would buy again. 6/11/19 update: After using this product, I’ve found it does not project enough light for me. My last one automatically illuminated light on the outside of the product as well as inside that really helped to project more light. There are too many dark colors. Hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: DeCarla Day

customer_reviews.title: Best night light
customer_reviews.text: Great night light! I bought one for my mom, and then ended up buying one for myself because I like it so much. I took other people's advice and put it on my shower curtain rod which works perfectly. The motion detection works exactly as described. It's nice that it only turns on when it detects motion and therefore preserves the battery. It's super easy to adjust the colors and brightness. Haven't had any issues with it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ana303

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchase me two in Jan. 2018. Great mood light amibience for the bathroom whenbit worked. These only lasted 10 mons. The co. Advertises a lifetime warranty. I hope they will honor their warranty. Update- company never replied to my email regarding honoring their “Lifetime Warranty.” I’ve purchased a third one in early 2019, AGAIN, this product failed me- three out of three! Another one bites the dust- in the trash where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: AllieBoBallie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Nothing worse than having to get up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom and getting blinded by the lights. I have mine set to purple. After seeing mine, my neighbor, Nana, and several friends have purchased one as well. Four simple recommendations 1. Don't use the batteries that come with it. I use Energizer rechargeables and get about 4 months of use. 2. Move it as far to the back of the rim as possible to lessen false activations. 3. Don't throw away the instructions. 4. Use a sanitary wipe to clean it, it doesn't appear to be waterproof so why take a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great, until it dies!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this eight months ago after replacing another brand with a short life. Love the light when walking into a dark bathroom in the middle of the night. Stays on long enough to give you a nightlight effect till you make back to bed. My only issue is it has died after eight months. Replaced batteries (new), light comes on very dim, flickers and goes out after a few seconds. I'm going to get another one because I like the concept, hoping it lasts a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic night light
customer_reviews.text: This light only comes on in low light situations, has many different color options as well as brightness levels. I set mine facing away from the bathroom door, towards the outside wall as I found that facing the door causes the light to come on just by walking past the bathroom. After a little adjustment period, I have it in a sweet spot where it only comes on when I walk up to the toilet (sometimes have to wave my leg in the general direction to make it come on). I set it to the blue light and lowest brightness setting to preserve battery life. It's enough to see the target without being overly bright.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I wish I would've bought one a long time ago. I no longer beat myself up trying to get to the bathroom at night in the dark. I also love the veriety of colors. The only thing I don't like about it is that the motion detector is a little too sensitive. It comes on often during the day and when the bathroom lights are on. That's not really a big issue though. Just means the battery won't last as long. I'd rather have that issue than it not being sensitive enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela

customer_reviews.title: Still working well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this motion detection toilet light 2 1⁄2 years ago. It is still working perfectly with the original batteries. I do not know how it could be improved: it picks up motion very quickly, the light glows brightly enough but not so bright that it disrupts night vision, it's easy to clean (not that it gets particularly dirty), and it's easy to remove and replace for toilet cleaning. It does exactly what is says it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Peri_P_Laneta

customer_reviews.title: Product is excellent, however
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent, however, we had to put some tape down on the toilet bowl, underneath the lid so it doesn't show, in order for the sensor to stay hanging on the toilet. Works fine that way but depending on your model of toilet, just bending the led piece doesn't necessarily keep it in place, you may also need to use some tape. But colors are excellent and motion sensor works great. Terrific if you like your bed/bath area dark as you can see the toilet without turning on any lights. Perfect for anyone who has nighttime bathroom needs.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Like Disco Ball In My Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is just a fantastic product!!! I wake up in the middle of the night, stumble into the bathroom, and Voila! the toilet bowl suddenly glows a soft gentle light...enlightening my path ...beckoning me to take perfect aim. It's simply awesome. I don't have to turn on my bathroom light. I like the changing colors too. It's like a disco ball in my bowl!!! My wife loves that it improves my aim at nighttime too! I can't comment on the battery life yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Functional at a great Price!  Makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Prompt delivery too. I already have purchased two for my own home and now another for a present for a friend. Coolest little light ever!! Beautiful, bright colors and easy to install.Does not interfere cleaning or opening/closing the toilet. Motion sensitivity is amazing, and truly makes a trip to the bathroom at night, a real joy. No stumbling around in the dark...Never turn on your bathroom light in the middle of the night again. This little jewel makes it bright enough to see in the dark without any problem. Wish I had found these years ago when my kids were little!! A great value too! Like them so much, I'll probably buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: A husband's folly
customer_reviews.text: I thought it crazy when he ordered this, but, (no pun) it has turned out to be kind of nice to have. The light is bright and colorful, you choose one or let it go through the spectrum for you. The bowl lights up and away you go. I'm guessing it's great for homes with small boys who have a habit of missing the target. Our nephews and nieces really appreciated it for their family. Yes, he got them as gifts for them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A REVIEW OF A GIFT
customer_reviews.text: I'm hesitant to review a product I purchased as a gift, but the Seller keeps sending me emails requesting that I do so, so here goes: Well packaged and arrived in a timely fashion. By all appearances, it looks just like it does in the photos. My nephews for whom I bought this appreciated it but reminded me that I also bought them one two years ago...which they thought was very cool. Turns out they were quite happy to receive it again because the previously gifted one had been accidentally "destroyed" by their dad's cleaning lady.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So at first this wasn't cooperating very well there were no instructions with it either, would love instructions. After playing with it though got it to work, my boys love the lights and helps greatly with nighttime potty trips. Love it! Its not too bright but I can adjust that, and the colors are awesome. I love that it doesn't move with the rubber portion. Great product, but again instructions would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Better than a regular night light!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my...My crazy dad saw this at his friends camper one weekend and he couldn’t stop talking on and on about the light in their toilet 😂😂. Well I got on here and seen this. It came on a Saturday so my dad was at the lake w his buddies and I had this ready to go and when he seen that we had a light in our toilet now too the look on his face was absolutely priceless....haha.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Drye Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great product - ** Update  only a 2 light options after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second company I have bought from and this one is the best. My grandson loves and it's great for night time if you don't want to wake someone up turning the light on. Update - it is now several months into owning this and it only shows green or red light options. Says it has a lifetime warranty, not sure who to contact. No option to return on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LtDanFan

customer_reviews.title: Light your with bowl with a glow...find your way to bathroom without turning on the lights!
customer_reviews.text: You'll easily find your way in the dark to take that middle of the night potty break! Easily attaches to the bowl and with the correct positioning, the sensor will detect your movement in the direction to the toilet...it lights up and guides the way. Also prevents you from guessing where to aim...Love this product and would be a good gift for someone who has everything - male or female.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Takerian

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the LED night light on July 18, 2017. About a 10 days ago the light would only flicker. I changed the batteries and the light continued to flicker and stay on properly. A few days later it quit working altogether. I emailed the company and they stated that should not have happened. They confirmed my address and within a few days I received a new one. Customer Service did a great job!! Thanks go to Rebecca at Upper Echelon Products Support!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: works really well
customer_reviews.text: I guess this activates when it is dark and the light senses motion nearby. It loops through a series of vibrant colors, totally illuminating the bowl. You need to install it on the side or front that can sense motion otherwise it won't work. It takes 3 AA batteries, it is a cleanable white plastic finish. The first one I received didn't seem to work correctly but they swapped it out free of charge and the one I got the second time has worked flawlessly. This is a no brainer christmas present for someone with kids I would think ....
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great For Night Time Peeing
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE**** The blue-colored LED died less than a year after purchase. So longevity is poor. However, their customer service was great. I googled "Lumilux contact us" and emailed their support and they're sending a replacement unit. **Original Review** I have no kids. I simply wanted a way to find the toilet in the middle of the night without blinding myself with the bathroom light. This thing works great. Battery life is good (~10 months so far). I keep it on it's dimmest setting. Note that the motion sensor is very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: William Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working correctly
customer_reviews.text: One year to the day that i bought this, it is now only displaying red and yellow? Changed batteries several times. Never dropped or got wet. Bought one a week before this one and it’s still going strong. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justmehere

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back, installed it and set it to white light. Almost immediately it stopped shutting off so it stayed on for about 2mos without shutting off, but I figured at least it's lighting up. The batteries finally died so I swapped them and I couldn't get it off red light, and then it decided to work only when it wanted to, and about a week after it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Craakyerhead

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit! Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but didn’t tell my boyfriend, I wanted it to be a surprise. His brothers were over visiting yesterday when it arrived. I waited until dusk to install it. My boyfriend was the first to discover it and he thought it was awesome. His brothers did too are each getting one now for their homes. I like that I can choose just one color if I want and also change the brightness. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly very pleasantly surprised by this item. The motion detection works perfectly, and only when it’s dark in the room (meaning it won’t turn on if the bathroom lights are on). The colors are nice and vibrant and even though the product looks cheap, it works exactly as described and is better than I expected it to be! Great gift for those who get up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom often.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cord

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It lights my way to the toilet without having to turn on bright lights which have a tendency to keep me from going back to sleep. I had Lumibowl lights before and they were ok for a while but eventually quit working and the company wouldn't replace them despite their one year warranty. The LumiLux lights are much better and easier to adjust to the color and brightness you desire. This seller is customer-friendly and is quick to take care of any problems or answer any questions. I have bought many of these sensor lights as gifts for family and friends and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bauer

product_meta.title: LumiLux Toilet Light Motion Detection - Advanced 16-Color LED Toilet Bowl Light, Internal Memory, Light Detection (White)
feature_bullets: MOTION ACTIVATED TOILET BOWL LIGHT - The built in sensor activates the night light by detecting body heat. The light illuminates the bathroom when you enter and shuts off when you leave. To maximize battery life, the motion sensor turns off the LED toilet light when it detects light. With the Lumilux toilet light, you can make a smart toilet out of your average commode.

16 COLOR LED TOILET NIGHT LIGHT - With an impressive range of colors, our 16 color toilet light will keep you safe as you seek out your porcelain friend in the dark. You can choose a fixed color to fit your mood or carousel mode for a light-up toilet seat show. Kids and adults alike will love the glowing water of their lighted potty.

FLEXIBLE ARM - The adjustable arm can be bent to fit around any toilet bowl rim and makes it extremely easy to install. The bendable arm provides a more secure fit when compared to toilet lights with cheap suction cups. And the bendable arm makes it easy to place the motion activated toilet light in other spots as well; hang it from the toilet paper holder, for example.

5 STAGE DIMMER - When it comes to bathroom gadgets, there is nothing quite like our bathroom night light for your toilet. With 5 different brightness levels, you can make your toilet bowl glow as dark or as bright as you want.

LIFETIME REPLACEMENT - As your prime source for illumination toilet accessories, we want to keep your bathroom lit for years. That's why we back our Lumilux motion sensor toilet bowl light with a lifetime replacement pledge. We've got you covered if anything happens to your toilet light.
